#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <climits>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int lld;

int main() {
    int t;
    float n;
	cin>>t>>n;
	cout.setf(ios::fixed);
	if((t%5 != 0)||(n<=t))
	    cout<<setprecision(2)<<n;
	else
	    cout<<setprecision(2)<<(((float)n)-(t+0.5));
	return 0;
}
